original_text: The young women will control themselves well and be pure in how they live. They will be good housewives who are kind to other people. They will respect their husbands. If they live in a good way like that, nobody will be able to say bad things about God's message.
korean_text: 신중하며 순전하며 집안 일을 하며 선하며 자기 남편에게 복종하게 하라 이는 하나님의 말씀이 비방을 받지 않게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: The young women will control themselves well
sentences.korean_translation: 젊은 여성들은 자신을 잘 통제할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and be pure in how they live
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 사는 방식에서 순수할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: who are kind to other people
If they live in a good way like that
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 그런 좋은 방식으로 산다면

sentences.original_text: nobody will be able to say bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 나쁜 말을 할 수 없을 것입니다
